system.requirements:
Tier 3; Medicae +10
Aptitudes: Intelligence, Fieldcraft, Nurgle
system.effect:
Gain +10 to all Medicae Skill Tests. If character fails a Medicae Skill Test whilst performing Extended Care, the can reduce the amount of damage suffered by their Patients by their Intelligence Bonus.
If their Patients are in danger of losing a Limb from a Critical Hit, the character provides their patient +20 to the Toughness Bonus to avoid losing the limb.
